description: Astronomer Tom Aldcroft developed the ECSV format to overcome limitations in the CSV format. For example, CSV datasets cannot contain metadata besides column names. ECSV files, on the other hand, can include metadata such as:

ECSV files store this metadata in YAML-formatted data structures, located at the beginning of the file. Each line in the YAML data structure's datatype section contains metadata for a corresponding CSV data column.
